title: What really goes on behind closed doors? Meet the couple revealing all
text:
She’s a self-proclaimed ‘Brummie scumbag’ who likes buying stuff. He’s an old Etonian posho who lives for hiking. And from next week Hannah Betts and her ‘better half’ Terence Derbyshire will be gracing our back page with a new warts-and-all column on midlife coupledom. Allow them to introduce each other…

Hannah on Terence

Six years ago, I knew who I was: a 42-year-old party animal, single, largely drunk. So single was I, in fact, I boasted a single column in which I discussed the highs and lows of the solo state – the highs particularly giddy. Good God, it was a blast – the god in question being Dionysus.

And then, five years ago, I stopped drinking, I met a chap, both my parents got sick...
description: She’s a self-proclaimed ‘Brummie scumbag’ who likes buying stuff.
